description: This course provides a comprehensive research opportunity, including an introduction to relevant background material, technical instruction, identification of a meaningful project, and data collection. The topic is determined by the faculty member in charge of the course and may relate to his/her research interests. Prerequisite: determined by individual instructor. Offered based on department decision.
name: Directed Research
prerequisites: determined by individual instructor. Offered based on department decision.

revisions.prerequisites: Prerequisite: determined by individual instructor. Offered based on department decision.

title: Directed Undergraduate Research
